meanings.sent1: The toy cars were exchangeable for stickers at the school fair.
meanings.sent2: The exchangeable tickets allowed us to switch our seats at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The exchangeable cookies in the jar mysteriously kept changing flavors.
meanings.sent4: Her mood was as exchangeable as the weather in spring.
meanings.sent5: The exchangeable keys jingled in his pocket, ready to be swapped for the spare set.

meanings.definition: Able to be traded or swapped.
meanings.sent1: The old books were exchangeable for store credit at the bookstore.
meanings.sent2: She found a rare coin that was exchangeable for a valuable stamp.
meanings.sent3: The exchangeable hats at the party made everyone look like twins.
meanings.sent4: His skills were as exchangeable as currency in a foreign land.
meanings.sent5: The exchangeable plants in the garden could be traded with neighbors for different flowers.

meanings.sent1: The parts of the puzzle were exchangeable with pieces from other sets.
meanings.sent2: The batteries in the remote control were easily exchangeable when they ran out.
meanings.sent3: The exchangeable shoes in the store seemed to magically switch places overnight.
meanings.sent4: Their opinions were as exchangeable as the colors on a mood ring.
meanings.sent5: The exchangeable light bulbs brightened the room with their interchangeable glow.
